website_summaries.verdict: Customers who want a sleek freezer-fridge combo will be happy with this top-quality product.
pros: 3.1-cubic-foot Energy Star-rated unit has storage shelves in both refrigerator and freezer doors
Adjustable shelves and a produce basket

website_summaries.verdict: A terrific refrigerator and freezer that is energy-efficient and proven to perform consistently.
pros: Adjustable thermostat allows you to set the perfect temperature within the range of 34-60°F
Includes one adjustable wire shelf, one glass shelf, a vegetable crisper and in-door storage to provide ample space
An ideal choice for dorm rooms, condos and other areas where space is limited
cons: Unit does not cool items as well as comparable models
Tends to be louder than similar units

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fridge and pretty strong
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fridge and pretty strong. It does make sounds but it's not too crazy loud. I did notice a lot of ice build up in the back wall on my fridge, but since it has a auto defroster, it melts it down into a hole. Drinks stay cold and the compartments are always handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Great mini-fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge was perfect for our basement rec room. It arrived extremely well double packed. I have only had it for about a week but wanted to suggest to others a table that we bought through Amazon for the fridge. The mini-fridge sits low to the ground and I searched all over for a suitable, sturdy table. I found a kids classroom table made of solid wood that fit the bill. The table is only 22 inches high which made the fridge the perfect height. (ECR4Kids 24" Square Deluxe Hardwood Activity Table, 22"H) The table comes in a longer size if you need a place for a microwave or some other item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my initial expectations
customer_reviews.text: I read many, many reviews of compact refrigerators before buying this one, which also had some negative reviews. A couple indicated damage during shipping, but this frig was packed extremely well and was in perfect condition. Some reviews also suggested noise from these units, but mine is very quiet. So far, after a couple of months of operation this is a five star item.
customer_reviews.author: Rae R. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Auto Defrost & Energy star Rated!!
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged in the EdgeStar Mini Refrigerator today. (01/12/2019) I was looking for a refrigerator that was Energy Star rated and one that had auto defrost. Both of these qualities were very hard to find in a mini refrigerator. I bought this to replace a full size unit in our basement because we did not need all the extra refrigeration space. This unit looks really nice, so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. G. S. Jr

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FRIG.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, very quiet, keeps ice cream frozen and makes excellent ice. It does all of this and uses practically no electricity. I couldn't be happier with this frig.
customer_reviews.author: Friend Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Nice under the counter where I have it but is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice under the counter where I have it but is free standing so can be used anywhere. Not very heavy so easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: JoeB

customer_reviews.title: So happy, even 4 years later- EdgeStar CRF321SS 3.1 Cu. Ft. Dorm Sized Mini-Fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is perfect for me (single person, small apartment). Holds just enough, (surprisingly large, well organized storage compartments), glass shelves are sturdy and put in the right place, well-designed crisper actually works, temp control is perfect, and the spacious freezer is a dream: performs great, easy to defrost, clean & maintain - this fridge also looks better than any other I've ever had! I have mine on a small but heavy kitchen counter-top table so that it is raised 30" off the floor, which is perfect for using fridge without tweaking my back. Still getting great service out of this excellent appliance 4 years later. Thank You, EdgeStar!
customer_reviews.author: Luna M

customer_reviews.title: Great for college
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Fridge in 2015. My daughter took it to college for two years and now my son has had it for two more. It works great, it will freeze in the freezer section and the cold section works as well. It does have a start up time required before it actually gets acclimated /cold and whatever you do, don't turn the thermostat down and leave it or you'll freeze everything overnight! My daughter & son both made that mistake. So if you are looking for a college tested machine than this may be the one for you. It has served well for my kids and I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great bedroom fridge
customer_reviews.text: Had this about 3 months now, and it works great. Gets cold as I want it to, and the freezer is an actual freezer. A few tiny spots of frost in the freezer, after 2 months. But nothing that even comes close to having to scrape out. Very quiet. Sometimes I can hear the compressor fan shut off, but that was quiet enough to make me wonder what that noise was. Once I figured it out, I don't even notice it. Tiny ice cube tray is a cute addition. The built in can holder is a little wonky, but that's not at all why I bought it, so not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I am LOVING this fridge! The freezer is roomy and can fit quite a bit. I love the drink holders on the door. And the crisper drawer. It's quiet in my bedroom, It only makes noises occasionally. The front and side can hold magnets, Which is perfect for my spice jars. I wish I got this fridge sooner! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition; set up easy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition; set up easy, except did need some help from our office "handyman" to switch side for doors to open). Set temp on medium, and it's been perfect; keeps food fresh, cold, and freezer food is as frozen as in my side-to-side home refrigerator! It's clean looking, quiet, just what I needed for my office. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J. Root

customer_reviews.title: Good frig with a tip
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little frig.I am an full-time RVer. This is the best one I have found. It draws very little current and fits in my shed perfectly. I have small auto cycling AC unit. In the shed. This seems to make out the difference in the power draw from the appliances.. It makes the freezer and two frigs work much better.
customer_reviews.author: JIMVET

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as a little fridge can be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have a Fridge in my room incase I have to quarantine from the rest of the family. Its fairly quiet, has enough room as you could expect and the freezer works great. Keeps stuff frozen and make my 2 inch ice cubes as quick or quicker that my expensive LG Fridge in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: Good mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Turned it on for a few days. Works well. Easily made ice cubes using a standard ice cube tray. Light in refrigerator when door opens. One downside - box and packing protection is fairly minimal. After unboxing my fridge found several good size dings and dents. Fridge works though, so I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, quiet fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice little fridge. I purchased it for a guest room, so it being quiet was important, and it is extremely quiet. Most of the time it doesn't make any sound at all, and when the motor does come on it's a whisper. The freezer made ice cubes in an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Avery

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Master bedroom Remodel
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews. When this small refrigerator arrived, I unpacked it and let it sit upright for 2 days before plugging it in. Once I plugged it in it worked perfectly. My remodel is not complete so this refrigerator is turned off at this time. When it was on for several days it worked well and was cold enough to make ice. It is perfect for my new coffee bar, refrigerator and microwave in my new master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We are using it in our RV and it is working well on the low medium setting. Looks great and the freezer is awesome too. Would give it 5 stars but only had it 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Mccune

customer_reviews.title: ... crazy hot summer this year and is still working great. Satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This compact fridge kept my food cold/frozen throughout the crazy hot summer this year and is still working great. Satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: I can keep a pretty big ice container and still have room for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Biggest freezer I have found in a small fridge, I can keep a pretty big ice container and still have room for a lot of frozen items. Also very quiet, don't even hear it running.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog56

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a separate frezzer compartment to keep my refrigerator ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a separate frezzer compartment to keep my refrigerator items from freezing. Sadly, no success with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruiser's Mom

customer_reviews.title: after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: it is working great. fedex rolled the box up to the door but it was an Xmas present so we sat it upright for a few days and hoped for the best. no problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca 4*

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is going in an RV so noise and power usage are a big concern. It is an energy star rated product so I'm hoping my solar system will support it, all the charts and computations say it will!!
customer_reviews.author: sndyrige

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill for camper living.
customer_reviews.text: We placed it in a Ram promaster for camping. Have never regretted it. Very good little fridge. Nice size, does a super job, serves a small family nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, BUT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these in the last 3 years. Both died. They just don't hold up. I wrote the first one off as getting older, bought the three year protection plan on the first one, and it died right after the warranty expired. The second one I didn't by the plan as the first one seemed to be doing fine. Wouldn't you know, it died shortly after the warranty expired. Not a very durable product. Too bad too, I really liked it but it doesn't pass the durability test. Time to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far no issues. Bought an extended just in ...
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues. Bought an extended just in case. Did arrive with a few dings, however. No instructions on how to drain the water from the back also. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Cool mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is very nice looking and much quieter than my last one. It may cost a bit more than other models out there but for me it's worth it. Being an energy saver is a plus too. It came in perfect condition and working order.
customer_reviews.author: F Brazeau

customer_reviews.title: It Works,and small in size and great for small area,and the price was not bad.and it’s looks Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Love it .It works and look elegant and Convenient in size for small space area .I will recommend this Merchandise to my Friends,Family members to have in a room.or even in a small work space area,Dorm room. I am satisfied with this merchandise ..
customer_reviews.author: Awilda Pineiro

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this appliance
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this appliance. There is only one change I would make if I could. The can dispenser in the door should be removable for those not wanting to use it for cans. It is wasted space since we are not able to rearrange it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged pretty well, small dent at the base. Very quiet, and decent sized! Very happy with this purchase! I would give it 5 stars if it weren't for the dent/crinkling at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: After having it for a few months, I can say we absolutely love it. It doesn't make sound for us like the other reviews say - it is really quiet. It keeps things colder in my tiny fridge than in my regular fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college, efficacy apartment or camper!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, packaging was excellent, product was cold in 20 minutes! Freezing ice in 45 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works really well for a second fridge ...
customer_reviews.text: defrost doesn't work as it should, considering the price and its size and type of usage(minimal) its a great deal...keeps my beverages cold and my ice cream bars solid
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dichazi

customer_reviews.title: It is worthy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It 's just like the way the seller described it. Both the fridge and freezer are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.  Response was too bad after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Broken after 5 months. I have bought a number of these at the same time. And response is tough luck after 30 days. Was buying 4 more for my new stores for June.
customer_reviews.author: Chad LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: Find another brand
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Normal size cans only fit on top shelf. Keeps everything coldish, but not ice cold like other brand do. I would buy another brand next time
customer_reviews.author: Daniel I Annis

customer_reviews.title: I want another one for myself !!! Lol
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter for her room .I really want one for myself. Lol it came super quick and it was packed in a box inside another box with all kinds of packing styrofoam great for the money and also very quiet...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this refrigerator - it works very well and as expected. I've had it for two years now and it's still going strong. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm 4ever

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good size and quality. Quiet and does not need to be defrosted. Was great for my son’s dorm. Now in my husbands office.
customer_reviews.author: Mich.L.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for purchase to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I recommend for purchase to anyone! I have this for over a year just about now and it is still kicking great as day one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frost's up fast
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller inside then I expected and the freezer Frost's up rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Walkowski

customer_reviews.title: its a good compact fridge
customer_reviews.text: it fits perfect and is use for a patients room
customer_reviews.author: rey.resgonia

customer_reviews.title: Great compact refrigerator/freezer
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator arrived very securely packed and in perfect condition. I am using it at my preschool and having the freezer as a separate compartment is ideal. It is spacious and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisbar

customer_reviews.title: Damaged piece !!
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box with a huge dent on the side ! Despite the double box !! Most likely a damaged piece was shipped out .
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Too much black and not enough chrome, however, still nice. Ice cubes in 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome size and looks nice, freezer is a great size too!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, efficient and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for a long time before I chose which refrigerator to buy. This fits the space wonderfully, the freezer works as well as a full size refrigerator/freezer. The interior of the refrigerator is designed in such a way that I can fit much more than I expected inside. I love that I can put a half gallon of milk on the door! It is quiet, and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: DorothyFeht

customer_reviews.title: College dorm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for college dorm room. Didn’t need mini ice tray. Arrived in great condition. Just the right size to fit under slightly lofted bed.
customer_reviews.author: algs

customer_reviews.title: Small but works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just the right size for extra storage. Also love the stand for it.
customer_reviews.author: doris broad

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, runs quietly and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator arrived well packed with no damage. Very pleased, runs quietly and looks nice. Has interior light. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my room, pretty quiet and keeps things very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great little fridge for my college dorm room. Works perfectly for me ! Very quiet !
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo P.

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged with a large dent in the back along the base. Was too late to do anything anything, as I had already hauled it to my daughter's college dorm room before I noticed it. We'll aee how if holds uz.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Volz

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: At the 3 mo Mark it's still running like day one. Decent room for the size and you can change out the shelving as you need. Works wekk
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small refrigerator for my daugther who has limited space in her apartment, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Castro

customer_reviews.title: It is too small and too warm
customer_reviews.text: It is too small and exceedingly warm. The doors open by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE CARNEGIE

customer_reviews.title: Looks Bery nice in person
customer_reviews.text: This mini fridge is elegant and compact. Looks Bery nice in person. I recommend it to others. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: XpressID Customercare

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. The separate freezer gives it a real ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The separate freezer gives it a real freezer instead of the semi-freezer on one door models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received this as a Christmas present because my old ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas present because my old mini fridge was so LOUD. This one I can barely even hear. The inside is very spacious and keeps my food cold.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact frig.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's being used in my daughters dorm room. It's only been a couple weeks that is has been used but it definitely looks sharp in her room and is keeping her Ben and Jerry's ice cream perfectly frozen! The only thing I wish is that the side can storage was set up different or not there at all because we have to take off the top shelf to fit the Briter water container in otherwise it's a great compact frig.
customer_reviews.author: Nannygoat

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a month, but so far amazing, I researched around for a while. This was the one
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: runs quiet and keeps everything at perfect temperature, very nice clean looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons studio apartment he has been using it for a few months now , runs quiet and keeps everything at perfect temperature , very nice clean looking , classy not at all cheap or flimsy looking would definitely recommend . Shipping was great was double packaged for added protection very impressed with the packing care .
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Great except for fixed can section.
customer_reviews.text: Good capacity, keeps food well. Wish it didn't waste half of the door storage on a can holder that is useless for anything else. Something removable or modifyable would be so much better for those of us trying to kick the soda habit.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor B

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fridge to replace another in my office that nearly drove me insane. This one is whisper quiet and keeps things f-f-f-f-frigid! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Barna

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold beer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fridge for four months. I keep soda, beer, juice, water, and my medicines in here. My only complaint it makes some of my beer too cold... but on the bright side it is ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freezer is good sized and holds full size ice cube trays easily
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Fits perfectly in the bedroom (Husband is disabled) flat top holds a Keurig with pod base with room to spare. Freezer is good sized and holds full size ice cube trays easily. I'm 5'6" and its about waist height. Very roomy fridge with can dispenser in door. "Crisper drawer" is about 1/3 size of regular fridge. Shelves are easy to clean. Runs quietly. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Medic PFFP

customer_reviews.title: Great overflow refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to stack sodas in a dispenser on the door. The size is perfect for the area in which I need the refrigerator and the freezer is large enough to utilize as extra freezer space.
customer_reviews.author: clewis

customer_reviews.title: Works, but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job, but a bit too noisy for our guest casita bedroom. Had to move it to the closet so guests could sleep. Looks very good for a low-priced unit.
customer_reviews.author: gtb4775

customer_reviews.title: Silent and cold
customer_reviews.text: This fridge worked as advertised. It's been exceptionally quiet and has maintained constant temps. A good all around purchase, in my view.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this refrigerator freezer for over five years and I couldn’t be happier with it. It is a great little product. The freezer freezer is really cold if you want it. Rarely needs defrosting. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fridge. It will get plenty cold, in the low 30’s. I struggled with the cans on the door, but with some pliers I was able to bend the bottom to allow cans. It should have been a no brainer when they designed this but probably cans across the world vary a little. Nonetheless, it works find
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Appartment refrigerator/freezer
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as advertised. We like having the freezer available as well as storage on the shelves of the refrigerator. The storage on the inside of the door is not very good. There's a place for pop, etc. cans, but difficult to get them in and out. Simple shelves would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Birdlady10000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it over a year ago and still works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 0711dog

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this fridge
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this purchase. The fridge works extremely well and is really quiet in operation. Highly Recommend it if you're looking for a "large" mini-fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B. Husted

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fridge. Its pretty big inside. Way more than enough for two people in an RV. The freezer freezes ice no problem down to 5F. Energy consumption is very low for a fridge this size. And its quiet, which is a huge plus when your sleeping right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Mini Fridge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for a dorm, bedroom, den, etc. I like that it is energy efficent, somewhat quiet, nice looking, and has a little extra freezer space then some other mini fridges I owned in the past. It was delivered when promised and so far works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia B

customer_reviews.title: Freezer works well
customer_reviews.text: Packed very well upon delivery. Have had for little over 2mths n very pleased with profomance. Quiet, stays cold n freezer actually freezes! Have seen similar ones at retail stores recently that are bit cheaper but not sure about their reliability without doing some research.
customer_reviews.author: 2much2do

customer_reviews.title: Miserably loud
customer_reviews.text: So loud- really it keeps me up at night sometimes and the most frustrating part is it is inconsistently loud so you can’t even get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great, fits anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and if I had it to do over I'd buy it again. Its compact and sturdy, keeps foods as well as a big fridge, and fits neatly into a very small space. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: zencatx

customer_reviews.title: Soda can holder feature is of a very poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine and fits my office space as I was hoping. But the soda can holder feature is of a very poor design and the cans just keep falling out every time you open the fridge door.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Its a good size for what I needed and came well packed. ( i.e. no dents of anything ). We currently have an apartment size refrigerator in the kitchen, and no space for our insulin, and this does it ( other overflow also). Did have to turn temp to min as back wall had ice above that.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fridge but a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fridge; it works great but is a little loud in the little cabin where we have it.
customer_reviews.author: sammiepie

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted a good freezer portion, so far it has not disappointed, everything is frozen. I don't know about durability because I has been just a week, it's a fridge so it should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: julio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Minifridge
customer_reviews.text: Temperature in freezer is 0 and in fridge is 36 to 38 degrees. Very quiet and stainless steel front looks great. I waited for a day after putting it in position before plugging it in to let the refrigerant settle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I have been running this unit with ease ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I have been running this unit with ease in my solar powered camper.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: noisy
customer_reviews.text: Cools well, nice design, nice looks, but runs too loudly.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: Refrig review
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well. It's nice looking and finished well. Both the refrig and freezer do a nice job of keeping everything cold.
customer_reviews.author: FrankG

customer_reviews.title: Good product good seller
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect dont make much sound and very little cleaning is needed. I use it like a normal big one. Only thing to remember is if you have carpet get something hard and flat that it can go on i used a big piece of wood the same size so you dont really see it and its fine that way on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Benny epstein

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fridge great freezer
customer_reviews.text: The freezer works good (-15 deg.) and the fridge takes some time to adjust temp using the temp control.
customer_reviews.author: mprfive

customer_reviews.title: Real stainless steel doors!
customer_reviews.text: It is everything the other reviews have stated, works great! Recommended for anywhere space is at a premium. I like the top cover that allows for another workspace, too.
customer_reviews.author: zardoz17

customer_reviews.title: What a great little frig!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to handle holiday overflow and act as a wine/beer cooler. It has worked well so far and looks really nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Surface

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a non profit organization. To date I have not seen it but have seen the founder of the organization. She was absolutely thrilled. Base on her opinion I am thrilled as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Great small refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Love this refrigerator. It is small, but it can hold A LOT of things inside. I also love that is ice free in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: taz

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Perfect for a room in an assisted living facility. Also nice to a have a separate freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Heimann

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied definitely a step up from your basic mini refrigerators
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it now for several months. Very satisfied definitely a step up from your basic mini refrigerators!!
customer_reviews.author: fair & balanced

customer_reviews.title: It's just right.
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is working perfectly and is just the right size for my mother-in-law suite.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy N

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get any better than this!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it: color, size, and VERY quiet. I’m using as a personal frig for in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this fridge so much. It's a great size and it keeps my drinks super cold
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorms and not noisy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dorms and not noisy. Comes with only one small ice tray, we bought extra two ice trays which fit perfectly in the freezer,
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Dalla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little fridge
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all food stay frozen and shipping fast.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: The only thing what I don't like is the wires inside on the door for cans
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year, still working. The only thing what I don't like is the wires inside on the door for cans. I don't buy any cans and I want to use it for something else, but you can't remove the wires nor adjust them. I probably have to find a way to vut them off, unfortunately. BUt then, there would be no shelves to hold anything...
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

product_meta.title: EdgeStar CRF321SS 3.1 Cu. Ft. Dorm Sized Energy Star Compact Fridge/Freezer
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThe EdgeStar 3.1 Cu. Ft. Energy Star Fridge/Freezer (CRF321SS) has all the features of a full sized refrigerator in the most compact space possible. The freezer and refrigerator are separated for easier space and storage, and the freezer can freeze foods down to 0 °F for maximum freezing time and temperature. Perfect for areas where space is an issue - like offices, dorm rooms, or any other small rooms - this fridge/freezer will help you store a lot in a small space. Temperature Control: An adjustable thermostat allows you to set the perfect temperature within the wide temperature range of 34-60 °F, while the auto defrost means there is no need to manually remove any ice buildup Storage: 3.1 cubic foot capacity, this refrigerator/freezer includes one (1) adjustable wire shelf and one (1) glass shelf, a vegetable crisper and in-door storage Perfect Size for an Office of Dorm: Leaving room for ventilation (1"-2" on the top & sides; 3"-4" in the back), the EdgeStar CRF320SS can fit into tight spaces while providing ample freezer and refrigerator storage Interior Lighting: The refrigerator compartment has an interior light that makes it easier to find stored food and drinks Energy Star Rated: This compact fridge freezer model is also Energy Star rated, meaning it is more energy efficient than most other models on the market today. Warranty 90 days labor and 1 year parts. External Dimensions: 33 1/2" H x 18 3/4" W x 19 3/4" D Freezer Dimensions: 7 7/8" H x 14" W x 14 3/4" D Compressor Step Dimensions: 7 1/8" H x 15 1/2" W x 4 3/8" D Refrigerator Dimensions: 18 5/8" H x 15 1/2" W x 14 1/2" D
feature_bullets: True zero degree freezer; Reversible doors; Door bins in both refrigerator and freezer sections
For freestanding installation; True stainless steel doors with black cabinets
Automatic defrost in refrigerator section; manual defrost in freezer section
Slide out shelves; Molded worktop; Energy Star rated; Warranty 90 days labor 1 year parts
More energy efficient with new refrigerant than previous model CRF320SS
